docs.text: App Configuration Steps to follow to configure a new Application. In this example we will create an application named: asm.bf Apple Store Google Store Code Configuration Create the asm.bf folder in devops/assets with the following structure - common - ios - env - options.plist - development - config.json - icon.png - splash.png - production - config.json - icon.png - splash.png Reference Configuration File Reference IOS Env File Reference IOS Options Plist File Reference Server Configuration
docs.title: App Configuration

docs.text: Steps to follow to configure a new Application. In this example we will create an application named: asm.bf
docs.title: App Configuration

docs.text: Create the asm.bf folder in devops/assets with the following structure - common - ios - env - options.plist - development - config.json - icon.png - splash.png - production - config.json - icon.png - splash.png
docs.title: Code Configuration

docs.text: Configuration File Reference IOS Env File Reference IOS Options Plist File Reference
docs.title: Reference

docs.text: Configuration file { "ENVIRONMENT": "Production", // Environment: Development, Test, Staging, Production "GHOST_MODE": false, // Enable Ghost Mode "DEBUG_FETCH": false, // Enable fetch debugger "DELAY_FETCH": false, // Enable fetch delay "DELAY_FETCH_MS": 1000, // Fetch delay milliseconds "DELAY_FETCH_RANDOM": false, // Enable random fetch delay "DELAY_FETCH_THROW_RANDOM_ERROR": false, // Enable throwing random error on fetch "DELAY_FETCH_PATHS": [], // Allow to enable fetch delay only on the passed paths "USE_DATA_DEBUG_LEVEL": null, // "USE_ANALYTICS_ENABLED": false, // "USE_ANALYTICS_LOG_TO_CONSOLE": true, // "USE_ANALYTICS_DEBUG_MODE": true, // "DISCOVER_GET_TEXT": false, // "ENTRYPOINT_TYPE": "OTP", // OTP, ANON "OTP_API_URL": "http://<uri>" // OTP Root URL }
docs.title: Configuration file

docs.text: { "ENVIRONMENT": "Production", // Environment: Development, Test, Staging, Production "GHOST_MODE": false, // Enable Ghost Mode "DEBUG_FETCH": false, // Enable fetch debugger "DELAY_FETCH": false, // Enable fetch delay "DELAY_FETCH_MS": 1000, // Fetch delay milliseconds "DELAY_FETCH_RANDOM": false, // Enable random fetch delay "DELAY_FETCH_THROW_RANDOM_ERROR": false, // Enable throwing random error on fetch "DELAY_FETCH_PATHS": [], // Allow to enable fetch delay only on the passed paths "USE_DATA_DEBUG_LEVEL": null, // "USE_ANALYTICS_ENABLED": false, // "USE_ANALYTICS_LOG_TO_CONSOLE": true, // "USE_ANALYTICS_DEBUG_MODE": true, // "DISCOVER_GET_TEXT": false, // "ENTRYPOINT_TYPE": "OTP", // OTP, ANON "OTP_API_URL": "http://<uri>" // OTP Root URL }
docs.title: Configuration file

docs.text: IOS ENV File # IOS CONFIGURATION IOS_CODE_SIGN_IDENTITY="<your sign identity certificate>" IOS_DEVELOPMENT_TEAM=<your ios devteam id> IOS_PROVISIONING_PROFILE_SPECIFIER=<your ios devteam id>/<your provisioning profile name>
docs.title: IOS ENV File

docs.text: # IOS CONFIGURATION IOS_CODE_SIGN_IDENTITY="<your sign identity certificate>" IOS_DEVELOPMENT_TEAM=<your ios devteam id> IOS_PROVISIONING_PROFILE_SPECIFIER=<your ios devteam id>/<your provisioning profile name>
docs.title: IOS ENV File

docs.text: IOS PList File <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <!DOCTYPE plist PUBLIC "-//Apple//DTD PLIST 1.0//EN" "http://www.apple.com/DTDs/PropertyList-1.0.dtd"> <plist version="1.0"> <dict> <key>destination</key> <string>upload</string> <key>method</key> <string>app-store</string> <key>provisioningProfiles</key> <dict> <key><!--ENTER HERE YOUR APPLICATION BUNDLE NAME--></key> <string><!--YOUR PROVISIONING PROFILE NAME--></string> </dict> <key>signingCertificate</key> <string><!--YOUR SIGNING CERTIFICATE--></string> <key>signingStyle</key> <string>manual</string> <key>stripSwiftSymbols</key> <true/> <key>teamID</key> <string><!--YOUR DEVELOPMENT TEAM ID--></string> <key>uploadBitcode</key> <true/> <key>uploadSymbols</key> <false/> </dict> </plist>
docs.title: IOS PList File

docs.text: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <!DOCTYPE plist PUBLIC "-//Apple//DTD PLIST 1.0//EN" "http://www.apple.com/DTDs/PropertyList-1.0.dtd"> <plist version="1.0"> <dict> <key>destination</key> <string>upload</string> <key>method</key> <string>app-store</string> <key>provisioningProfiles</key> <dict> <key><!--ENTER HERE YOUR APPLICATION BUNDLE NAME--></key> <string><!--YOUR PROVISIONING PROFILE NAME--></string> </dict> <key>signingCertificate</key> <string><!--YOUR SIGNING CERTIFICATE--></string> <key>signingStyle</key> <string>manual</string> <key>stripSwiftSymbols</key> <true/> <key>teamID</key> <string><!--YOUR DEVELOPMENT TEAM ID--></string> <key>uploadBitcode</key> <true/> <key>uploadSymbols</key> <false/> </dict> </plist>
docs.title: IOS PList File
